GSD.product_version: versions from v4.12 to before v6.0.7
GSD.description:
media: atomisp: prevent integer overflow in sh_css_set_black_frame()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v6.0.7 by commit a549517e4b761f3940011db30320cb8c9badde54, it was introduced in version v4.12 by commit a49d25364dfb9f8a64037488a39ab1f56c5fa419. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: media: atomisp: prevent integer overflow in sh_css_set_black_frame()
